name: Association of International Life Offices
goal: To represent life assurance companies who only operate cross border within the EEA to their Regulator, NCAs, MEPs and persons who work for the Commission and Council.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives: Regulations and Directives aimed at Financial Services, cross border activities and distribution such as Solvency II, PRIIPS, IDD, PEPPs ...
